name: Malfunction (itch) (RedPickxel)
description:
A game created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam

In this game, you play as a robot, fighting against monsters that threaten humanity.
Unfortunately, you have been infected by a virus. Even with all your effort, you are barely able to retain control.
Give up to five instructions each turn. The more you give, the higher the chance of a Malfunction occuring, sending you out of control.

Content Warning: Mild violence
